# Get the game

The game was successfully funded through a [crowdfunding campaign](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bigfishcardgame/big-fish-the-tasmanian-fishing-and-ocean-card-game), raising funds to bring this game into the world. Yay! The game has been printed and is finally available for sale. We are currently finalising our brand new website, but meanwhile you can also buy the game using the link below. 
:::::::::::

::::::::::: {.grid .column-screen .mx-1 .mx-sm-2 .mx-md-3 .mx-xl-4 .spacer-1em .text-center style="--bs-columns: 1;"}
[Get the game](https://www.mtunderwatermedia.com/big-fish-card-game){.btn .btn-secondary}
:::::::::::

::::::::::: {.grid .column-screen .mx-1 .mx-sm-2 .mx-md-3 .mx-xl-4 .spacer-1em .text-center style="--bs-columns: 1;"}
Please [get in touch](mailto:info@bigfishcardgame.com) if you have further ideas on how to promote and fund the game and engagement activities, if you are a teacher and would like to use the game in your lessons, or if you have other questions or suggestions.
:::::::::::
